welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Squamish, Canada! Known for its breathtaking natural beauty, charming small-town atmosphere, and endless outdoor adventures, we invite you to take in all that this wonderful city has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coal Harbour Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sechelt Airport offers passenger check-in, baggage claim, and boarding gates for all flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Sechelt Airport caters to private and chartered flights, with exclusive lounges and amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal and private lounge areas.
